mapper.select: select review_num, user_image, review_info.user_email, review_content, review_time from review_info, user_info where webtoon_num = #{wbnum} and review_info.user_email = #{mail} and review_info.user_email = user_info.user_email

select user_image, review_info.user_email, review_content, review_time from review_info, user_info where webtoon_num = #{wtnum} and not review_info.user_email in(#{mail}) and review_info.user_email = user_info.user_email order by review_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into review_info(review_num, webtoon_num, user_email, review_content) values(review_num_seq.nextval, #{wtnum}, #{mail}, #{content})
